name: Black Olive Paste
recipeCategory: easy, quick, condiments, dips and spreads
keywords: black olives, olive oil, rosemary, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 cups oil-cured black olives, pitted and minced

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the ingredients and blend with a fork. If using a food processor, be very careful not to over-process; a chunky texture is better. Store in a tightly sealed container in the refrigerator for up to one month.

To use the olive paste as a marinade, slather chicken, fish, beef or veal well and marinate for up to 6 hours before cooking. The mixture can also be used as a sauce by spooning over meat, poultry or fish in the last five minutes of cooking.
